data.name: moduleExecAndCaptureOutput

moduleGetLine
data.comment: function GetLine(const S: string; LineNumber: Integer): string;

moduleInitializeWizard
moduleIsDotnetRuntimeInstalled
moduleNeedsDotNet
modulePosEx
data.comment: function PosEx(const SubStr, S: string; Offset: Integer): Integer;

data.name: msgSignToolNotFound
data.value: Please specify SignTool.exe path and filename or set your SIGNTOOLPATH environment variable to the path to the path where SIGNTOOL.EXE is located.

data.name: rxAutogeneratedTag
data.comment: Regular expression to determine whether the line contains the auto-generated tag message.

data.name: rxBoolTrue
data.comment: Match a common bool true expression.

data.name: rxDotNetRunFilename
data.comment: Regular expression to test for the presence of the run file containing the dotnet runtime installer.

data.name: rxDotNetRunFilenameFamily
data.comment: Regular expression to test for the presence of any file in the specified filename family of the dotnet runtime installer.

data.name: rxDotNetRuntimeFilePresence
data.comment: Regular expression to test for the presence of the filename containing the dotnet runtime installer.

data.name: rxInnoSetupSectionName
data.comment: Regular expression for finding and extracting an INI section name.

data.name: rxLine
data.comment: Regular expression to extract individual lines from a multi-line string.

data.name: rxPascalBegin
data.comment: Regular expression to extract the begin keyword from a Pascal line.

data.name: rxPascalEnd
data.comment: Regular expression to extract the end keyword and usage from a Pascal line.
